text: Thank you to the Academy for this incredible recognition.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: It doesn't escape me for one moment that so much joy in my life is thanks to so much pain in someone else's.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: And so I want to salute the spirit of Patsy for her guidance.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: And for Solomon, thank you for telling her story and your own.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: Steve McQueen, you charge everything you fashion with a breath of your own spirit.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: Thank you so much for putting me in this position.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: It has been the joy of my life.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: I'm certain that the dead are standing about you and watching, and they are grateful, and so am I. Chiwetel, thank you for your fearlessness and how deeply you went into telling Solomon's story.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: Michael Fassbender, thank you so much.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: You were my rock.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: Alfre and Sarah, it was a thrill to work with you.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: Joe Walker, the invisible performer in the editing room, thank you.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: Sean Bobbitt, Calla Davey, Adrutha, Patty Norris, thank you, thank you, thank you.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: I could not be here without your work.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: I want to thank my family for your training.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: And the Yale School of Drama as well for your training.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: My friends,
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: The Wilsons, this one's for you.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: My brother, Junior, sitting by my side.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: Thank you so much.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: You're my best friend, and Ben, my other best friend, my chosen family.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: When I look down at this golden statue, may it remind me and every little child that no matter where you're from, your dreams are valid.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: Thank you.
speaker: SPEAKER_00
